mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO sys_role_user(role_id, user_id) VALUES (#{roleId}, #{userId})
mapper.select:
SELECT u.* FROM sys_user AS u
INNER JOIN sys_role_user AS ru ON ru.user_id = u.id
WHERE
ru.role_id = #{roleId}
u.id NOT IN ( SELECT ru.user_id FROM sys_role_user AS ru WHERE ru.role_id = #{roleId} )
AND LOCATE(#{condition.username}, u.username) > 0
ORDER BY u.created_at ASC
